1.name: Hex Sphere
1.description: A concentrated sphere of Chaos Magic blasts Scarlet Witch's opponents.

2.name: Hex Bolt
2.description: Scarlet Witch sends her opponents flying with a bolt of Chaos Magic.

3.name: Probability Manipulation
3.description: Scarlet Witch calculates the mathematical probability to make happen whatever she wants. So watch out, because she's REALLY good at math!

signature.name: Veil of Fortune
signature.description: Whenever a Critical Hit occurs for either player, Scarlet Witch manipulates the outcome for her benefit.

description: Sister to Quicksilver, Wanda Maximoff a.k.a. The Scarlet Witch is a true master of chaos magic utilizing a deep understanding of mathematics to ensure success as she brandishes her amazing talents for probability manipulation and reality warping.
